name: PANDORA MEDIA LLC
sampleDescriptions:

S. 2823
Antitrust - ASCAP and BMI Consent Decrees, workforce diversity issues

S. 2823, and H.R. 1551, the Orrin G. Hatch - Bob Goodlatte Music Modernization Act
